## SendableLiquity.stakeLQTY() method

Stake LQTY to start earning fee revenue or increase existing stake.

**Signature:**

```typescript
stakeLQTY(amount: Decimalish): Promise<SentLiquityTransaction<S, LiquityReceipt<R, void>>>;
```

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

amount


</td><td>

[Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md)


</td><td>

Amount of LQTY to add to new or existing stake.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[SentLiquityTransaction](./lib-base.sentliquitytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [LiquityReceipt](./lib-base.liquityreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, void&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out an existing LQTY stake's [collateral gain](./lib-base.lqtystake.collateralgain.md) and [DebtToken gain](./lib-base.lqtystake.debttokengain.md)<!-- -->.
